xscuwdt_g.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains a table that specifies the configuration of the SCU watchdog timer devices in the system. Each device should have an entry in the table.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who Date     Changes
 ----- --- -------- ---------------------------------------------
 1.00a sdm 01/15/10 First release

#include "xscuwdt.h"
#include "xparameters.h"

Variables

XScuWdt_Config XScuWdt_ConfigTable [XPAR_XSCUWDT_NUM_INSTANCES]

Variable Documentation

XScuWdt_Config XScuWdt_ConfigTable[XPAR_XSCUWDT_NUM_INSTANCES]
 

Initial value:

 {
        {
                XPAR_SCUWDT_0_DEVICE_ID,
                XPAR_SCUWDT_0_BASEADDR
        }
}
This table contains configuration information for each watchdog timer device in the system.
